On March 19, a gold mine in the Central African Republic suffered a targeted armed attack, which has so far caused the death of 9 Chinese citizens and serious injuries to 2 people.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On March 20, on the first anniversary of the China Eastern Airlines crash, the Civil Aviation Administration of China issued a notice on the progress of the investigation into the March 21 China Eastern Airlines MU5735 aircraft flight accident, saying that the investigation was still ongoing because the accident was very complex and extremely rare. Event review: On the afternoon of March 21, 2022, a Boeing 737-800 passenger plane of China Eastern Airlines flew from Kunming to Guangzhou. After being monitored to be rapidly descending and losing contact, the aircraft was found to have crashed in a forest in Motan Village, Tannan Town, Teng County, Wuzhou City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region on the same day. There were 123 passengers and 9 crew members on the crashed plane. After 6 days of full search and rescue, the National Emergency Response Command Center for the March 21 China Eastern Airlines MU5735 aircraft flight accident confirmed on the evening of the 26th that all the people on board China Eastern Airlines MU5735 flight had died.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On March 20, in response to issues such as the increase in the number of empty containers, Yu Jianhua, Director General of the General Administration of Customs, said that a large number of empty containers are waiting to be shipped at my country's ports, which to some extent reflects that the international market is still optimistic about our export capabilities in the next stage.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Donghai International Holding (Shandong) Group Co., Ltd. issued an internal document, "Notice on Declaring War on Despicable Personnel of Blackmailing Companies". The document stated that the company will not accept any form of mediation and will strike head-on according to law against those who use illegal means to demand improper benefits through arbitration, litigation, etc.
It also stated that it would set up a "despicable personnel employment tracking post" to track the despicable personnel of the blackmailing company for 5 years, and send legal letters to wherever they go.
It is said that the cause was that the company did not give corresponding compensation after laying off employees, and the employees used arbitration to protect their legitimate rights and interests, so the company issued this notice.

content: On March 20, Chinese President Xi Jinping arrived in Russia for a three-day state visit and was greeted at the airport by Russian Deputy Prime Minister Dmitry Chernyshenko.
